items.title: Octopus x hololive 3rd Generation Physical Card Collection is Now Available for Pre-Order!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
February 27, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce the renewed collaboration between hololive production and Octopus Card, unveiling a special series of physical Octopus card sets featuring the talents of hololive 3rd Generation.

Octopus Card Collection Details

The hololive 3rd Generation Octopus Card collection comes in two versions: a Single Card Set and a Collector’s Set, tailored for both practical users and passionate collectors.

Dressed in autumn‑winter school uniforms, the four members are ready to accompany you across Hong Kong—ride the MTR, board double‑decker buses, tour on trams, and sail the harbour—making them part of your daily commute and city exploration!

Set Includes: ・ hololive 3rd Generation Physical Octopus Card

・ Octopus Card Holder with Lanyard

Set Includes: ・ hololive 3rd Generation Physical Octopus Card

・ Octopus Slide-on Card Holder

・ Card Display Stand

・ Acrylic Shikishi Artboard

・ Gift Box Packaging

Pre‑order your exclusive Octopus Card today and let hololive 3rd Generation members join you as you journey through Hong Kong!

Octopus is a contactless stored value card that provides customers with a simple, safe, and secure way to pay. First launched in 1997 across public transport systems, the applications of the Octopus card have since expanded to include retail stores and various facilities, making everyday life more convenient.

items.title: hololive production Special Day with Albirex Niigata FC (S) is coming to Singapore on May 16, 2026!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
February 16, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce its participation in the special event, “hololive production Special Day with Albirex Niigata FC (S).” This event will be held in Singapore on May 16, 2026 as part of the 60th Anniversary of the Establishment of Diplomatic Relations between Japan and Singapore (SJ60).

Four globally recognized hololive production talents representing different regions will participate: (hololive / Tokyo Tourism Ambassador)

: #hololive_SJ60

: hololive production Special Day with Albirex Niigata FC (S): Saturday, May 16, 2026: Jurong East Stadium (Singapore): Albirex Niigata Singapore vs Young Lions: 3,500 spectators: SGD 21 (± JPY 2,500): DOU Creations Pte Ltd: Football Association of Singapore* The football match will be held as an official Singapore Premier League fixture. Separate match tickets are required.

On match day, the stadium will be transformed into a unique entertainment experience combining real sports and virtual culture.

Planned highlights include: ・ Screening of original music videos

・ Special greetings & Q&A session (pre-recorded)

・ Multilingual challenge segment

・ Exclusive halftime performance

In addition, Mori Calliope is scheduled to host a YouTube mirror livestream, allowing fans worldwide to enjoy the event online.

■ Livestream Schedule (Subject to Change) May 16, 2026 (Sat) 19:30 – 22:30 (JST)

A detailed timetable will be announced at a later date.

SJ60 Limited-Edition Collaboration Merchandise

Exclusive collaboration merchandise featuring newly illustrated visuals will be available both onsite and through advance online sales, through an event-exclusive website. Items ship to Japan and all 11 countries and regions in Southeast Asia. For detailed information, please visit the official collaboration website.

・ Replica Uniform (1 type)

・ Acrylic Stands (4 types)

: February 16, 2026, 10:00 (JST): March 1, 2026, 17:00 (JST)* With limited exceptions, merchandise will be available primarily through advance sales. * On-site sales on match day will be extremely limited. Advance purchase is strongly recommended.

* Selected items will be available exclusively via pre-order.

For online sales and the latest updates, please visit the official campaign website.

Significance as an SJ60 Commemorative Event

This project represents a future-oriented cultural exchange, bringing together Japan’s leading digital entertainment brand and Singapore’s community-rooted Japanese football club .

Through the fusion of VTuber culture and live sports, the event aims to create an unprecedented celebration of friendship between Japan and Singapore for the next generation.

: Official announcement & merchandise sales begin: Event day

DOU Creations Pte. Ltd. is a Singapore-based business strategy and marketing consultancy dedicated to breaking down market borders and supporting Japanese companies and content to expand overseas, particularly in Southeast Asia. The company provides comprehensive services spanning business strategy development, market research, product planning, and local execution of branding and marketing activities. With a mission to help Japanese products and cultural IP reach global audiences, DOU Creations has supported initiatives such as the operation of Japanese Film Week events and cultural festival booths abroad.

items.title: Visit both Tokyo Station and Narita Airport shops to get an exclusive postcard!
items.author: narita
items.content:
To celebrate the opening of “hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Taking Off at Narita Airport!” we are excited to announce a special collaboration campaign with the “hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station.”

During the campaign period, bring a receipt from one shop to the other to receive an exclusive, limited-edition postcard (not for sale) as a special gift! Don’t miss this chance to visit both locations and collect these unique rewards.

Friday, February 13, 2026 – Monday, March 9, 2026

・ hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station Venue: Tokyo Character Street, B1, First Avenue Tokyo Stationhere for more details.

・ hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Taking Off at Narita Airport! Venue: Central Bldg. 4F, Terminal 1, Narita Airporthere for more details.

1. Make a purchase at either participating shop.

2. Bring your receipt to the other shop.

3. Show your receipt to the staff at the cashier to receive your postcard.* Staff will mark the receipt once the gift has been redeemed.

The exclusive postcards (not for sale) come in 5 designs in total, and designs vary by shop and distribution period.

・ At hololive production official shop in Tokyo Station: Phase 1: Feb 13 (Fri) – Feb 27 (Fri)

Phase 2: Feb 28 (Sat) – Mar 9 (Mon)

・ At hololive Meet Pop up Shop: Phase 1: Feb 13 (Fri) – Feb 20 (Fri)

Phase 2: Feb 21 (Sat) – Feb 27 (Fri)

Phase 3: Feb 28 (Sat) – Mar 9 (Mon)

・ Postcard designs will change according to the schedule at each shop. ・ Supplies are limited and will be distributed on a first-come, first-served basis while stocks last.

・ Only receipts issued during the campaign period (Feb 13 – Mar 9, 2026) are valid for redemption.

・ Each receipt is valid for one (1) postcard.

・ We cannot accept returns or exchanges for the postcard, except in the case of defective items.

・ Please check the official website of each facility for business hours and access information.

items.title: Funko POP! x hololive production Figurines Have Been Announced!
items.author: os_pr
items.content:
February 2, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo, Japan; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is thrilled to announce a collaboration with Funko, releasing a series of POP! collectibles featuring hololive production talents Sakura Miko, Mori Calliope, and Takanashi Kiara. This new collection marks the first collaboration between hololive production and Funko. Fans can look forward to these collectibles hitting shelves and opening for global purchase at a later date, also available on the hololive production OFFICIAL STORE from late March 2026.

For more information on the product release, please visit Funko’s official website and social media platforms.

Funko is a leading pop culture lifestyle brand that creates high quality products for fans to connect with their favorite fandoms. Through its iconic Pop! vinyl figures, apparel, and accessories, the company translates the world’s most popular movies, shows, and digital creators into tangible collectibles.

items.title: ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- Hanbok-inspired Collaboration Café starts on February 5!
items.author: Horii
items.content:
January 23, 2026, Tokyo, JAPAN – COVER Corporation (Minato-ku, Tokyo; CEO: Tanigo Motoaki) is pleased to announce a collaboration café event between ANIPLUS and hololive English -Advent-, taking place across February 5 – March 22, 2026 in South Korea. This collaboration will take place at ANIPLUS SHOP Seoul and Busan, and centers around an exclusive Hanbok-themed key visual of the five members of hololive English -Advent-.

The members of hololive English -Advent- have collaborated with ANIPLUS to curate delicious menu items that can be enjoyed throughout the event. Fans will also be able to enjoy the talents’ new look through various merchandise, including acrylic standees, can badges, a long mousepad, blanket, and much more!

For more information, please check out the ANIPLUS official social media accounts below.

ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- Café Menu Details

ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- Café Merchandise Details

ANIPLUS x hololive English -Advent- Collaboration Cafe February 5 – March 22, 2026 Delight Square B101-105, 14 World Cup-ro 3-gil, Mapo-gu, Seoul

Samjung Tower 9F, 672, Jungang-daero, Busanjin-gu, Busan, Republic of Korea
